summary: The diff implements REQ-42 by updating the 'प्रवेश के लिए आवेदन करें' button in HomePage.tsx to use emerald green (bg-emerald-600, hover:bg-emerald-700, active:bg-emerald-800) with white text and transition states. This is a distinct color not in the saffron/gold/deep-red palette, with readable text and visible hover/focus states. All other buttons retain their existing styling.
